name: SaveSantaClaus!
description:
"Santa's sleigh broke and many of his gifts were lost during the fall, including his hat! Find the hat before Santa's identity is revealed, find all the lost gifts and deliver them before sunrise or Christmas will be ruined!" Instructions:
  • Movement: WASD
  • Collect and deliver all 30 gifts
  • Find the Santa hat before the time runs out
  • To enter the houses, you have to get close to the smoke extractors
CREDITS: Game and Level designer: Luca Vitiello Programmer: Hecker 2D Artist: GuyW Sound Designer: Manuel Saenz
